Summary

Defining URLhttp://terminology.hl7.org/NamingSystem/v3-snomed-CT
Version3.1.0
NameSNOMED_CT_INT
TitleSNOMED CT International Edition
Statusactive
Definition

SNOMED CT is a core clinical healthcare terminology that contains concepts with unique meanings and formal logic based definitions organized into hierarchies.

PublisherInternational Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO) trading as SNOMED International

TypeValuePreferred
